title.native: 本好きの下剋上 司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません OVA
title.romaji: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen OVA
title.english: Ascendance of a Bookworm Side Story

description:
Side Story One: Eustachius's Incognito Operation Downtown
The head priest wants more information on Myne, and so he sends two of his aides, Eckhart and Justus, to investigate her.

Side Story Two: Visiting Missus Corinna
Effa and Tuuli find themselves having to accompany Myne to Corinna's residence, because she wants to take a look at the outfit Myne wore for her baptism.

Note: This two-part OVA was bundled with Part 5 Volume 1 of the LN. The OVA consist of two side stories, the first adapts a chapter from Part 3 Volume 2 of the LN, and the second adapts a chapter from Part 1 Volume 3 of the LN. Both side stories chronologically happen at the end of Part 1 of the LN.
synonyms: Ascendance of a Bookworm Side Story One: Eustachius's Incognito Operation Downtown
Ascendance of a Bookworm Side Story Two: Visiting Missus Corinna
หนอนหนังสือยึดอำนาจ OVA

node.description:
[Tumblr](https://youshiina.tumblr.com) | [Website](https://youshiina111.wixsite.com/artworks)

__You Shiina__ is a Japanese freelance illustrator. She has done character design and cover illustrations for many Light Novels, children's books, as well as some video games. Formerly a student of famous artist and designer [Range Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/98445).

__Agency:__ Gekidan Himawari

[Profile](https://profile.himawari.net/view/1622) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/smileysuu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sumire__morohoshi/) | [YouTube](https://youtube.com/channel/UCTlieWyDS62ZGG3yMFswS5g) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumire_Morohoshi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%AB%B8%E6%98%9F%E3%81%99%E3%81%BF%E3%82%8C)

Sumire Morohoshi is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Kanagawa Prefecture. She is affiliated with Himawari Theatre Group, and debuted as a solo singer under the record label Flying Dog.

**Non-Anime Roles**:
- Pela - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Yuni - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Product 08 - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Gallica - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Yaiyai Yarucar - Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger (TV Series)

__Blood Type:__ A
__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")
__Hobby:__ Collecting records, watching professional wrestling
__Agency:__ Stay Luck

[Profile](https://stay-luck.com/talent/nakajima-megumi) | [Website](https://nakajima-megumi.jp) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mamegu_staff) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkOGw3UbTMkj8U0VYzdmi5A) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/24277.html)

Born of a Japanese father and a Filipino mother, Megumi was brought up in a "house filled with music" and grew up with the desire to sing.  In 2003, she participated in the "Self Stardust Promotion" contest and passed, thereby affiliating her to the agency. In 2007, she auditioned to the Victor Entertainment sanctioned "Victor Vocal & Voice Audition" and won the role to voice Ranka Lee in Macross Frontier.  She is also the voice provider for the Vocaloid, [Megpoid](https://anilist.co/staff/140519).

She is affiliated with Stay Luck for voice acting and FlyingDog for singing.

**Birthplace:** Niigata City, Niigata Prefecture, Japan
**Major:** National History

**[Website](http://www.yuhoiwasato.com/)**

**Iwasato Yuuho** is a Japanese lyricist and essayist (and former singer-songwriter), who is well-known for writing the lyrics to many anime theme songs. She graduated from Chuo University Faculty of Letters, Department of History, majoring in national history.

__[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/sira10/)__

__Birthplace:__ Toride City, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan

__Yuusuke Shirato__ is a Japanese arranger, composer, lyricist and musician.

__[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/sira10/)__

__Birthplace:__ Toride City, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan

__Yuusuke Shirato__ is a Japanese arranger, composer, lyricist and musician.

[Official Website](https://yoshizawakayoko.com/s/y07/?ima=4848) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yoshizawakayoko)

__Kayoko Yoshizawa__ (June 4, 1990) is a singer and songwriter from Kawaguchi, Saitama Prefecture, Japan.

[Official Website](https://yoshizawakayoko.com/s/y07/?ima=4848) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yoshizawakayoko)

__Kayoko Yoshizawa__ (June 4, 1990) is a singer and songwriter from Kawaguchi, Saitama Prefecture, Japan.

[Official Website](http://www.kiyoshiryujin.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryujin_kiyoshi/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kiyoshiryujin/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5IvOWrKPZ83NNDSy9maFwQ)

__Ryuujin  Kiyoshi__ is a singer and songwriter, born in Yodogawa-ku, Osaka, Japan.
